description: a line of text that does not begin or end with whitespace
text that does not begin or end with whitespace
a single word: letters, numbers, underscore
the MRO restriction level: class, complete molecule, haplotype, locus, partial molecule, serotype
an OWL entity type: owl:AnnotationProperty, owl:Class, or owl:ObjectProperty
an OWL class type: equivalent or subclass
a sequence source: IPD, GenBank, or UniProt
a protein sequence using the following characters: A, R, N, D, C, Q, E, G, H, I, L, K, M, F, P, S, T, W, Y, V, X, ?
